author: pburba
msg: (insert_child_to_merge): Copy cached propval member too when manipulating
children_with_mergeinfo, as this is possible since r26243.

author: pburba
msg: Fix for Issue #2827 Handle mergeinfo for sparse directories.
(determine_merges_performed): Add a flag indicating whether the target WC
directory path is missing any children.  Always set overriding mergeinfo
if a path is missing children.
(get_mergeinfo_walk_cb): Accumulate directories that may be missing
(get_mergeinfo_paths): Tweak doc string to reflect changes to helper

author: pburba
msg: * www/merge-tracking/func-spec.html: Add section on merging to sparse WCs.

author: kameshj
msg: rangelist is an array of 'svn_merge_range_t *' not 'svn_merge_range_t' so
